name: Half-Shadow Dragon Assassin
description: The Half-Shadow Dragon Assassin is a lethal humanoid with a blend of dragon and stealthy traits, known for its agility and ability to ambush foes.
memorable: Its ability to apply dangerous poison and deal extra damage with sneak attacks makes this assassin particularly feared.
goals: To ambush and eliminate targets before they can react, utilizing stealth and speed.
relations: May be encountered alongside other assassins or shadowy affiliates.
environment: Often found in dark, secluded areas where it can utilize its stealth.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances its stealth and acrobatics, making it difficult to hit and capable of swift attacks.
weaknesses: Relatively low Constitution and lacks magical defenses, making it vulnerable to spells.
attacks: Attacks include a shortsword strike dealing piercing and poison damage or a hand crossbow shot with similar effects.
most_powerful_ability: The Assassinate ability grants advantage on attacks against unsuspecting enemies, plus additional effects on a successful hit.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
skills: Highly skilled in Acrobatics and Stealth, with decent proficiency in Deception and Perception.
additional_information: Carries three doses of a dangerous poison for weapon application.
Employs ambush tactics to maximize damage output quickly.
test_queries: agile humanoid that deals necrotic damage
fearsome ambusher with powerful sneak attacks
dark creature that excels in stealth tactics
